oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Music Hall of Fame Series - Tape 9
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: The recording is of the Music Hall of Fame series tape number nine. The recordings are from Decca Records and MCA Records. Tape consists of performances by Hank Thompson. The recordings are from an unidentified date.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Hank Thompson
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (00:00) Modine (Hank Thompson) -- (03:29) Golden Turnpike in the Sky (Hank Thompson) -- (06:56) I Lost My Wife to a Truck Drivin' Man (Hank Thompson) -- (09:11) Movin' on (Hank Thompson) -- (11:33) Trucker's Lullaby (Hank Thompson) -- (14:17) 15 Miles to Clarksville (Hank Thompson) -- (16:43) The Asphalt Cowboy (Hank Thompson) -- (19:30) Truck Drivers Turn Them On (Hank Thompson) -- (22:40) 15 Gears and 14 Wheels (Hank Thompson) -- (25:28) Truck it on Down to My House Baby (Hank Thompson)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Thompson, Hank;
